segments.text: I keep coming back to the woman and her unyielding focus on that single plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's missing absolutely everything happening right around her, it's incredible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer volume of water cascading from the sink is truly astounding to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the children, right there, risking a nasty tumble for a handful of cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me wonder what thoughts could possibly be so engrossing to her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Perhaps she's lost in a peaceful daydream, completely oblivious to practical matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost like she's existing in a different world altogether, separated from reality.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The potential for significant water damage and serious injury is truly worrying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang of sadness for the inevitable mess that will ensue in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a shame that such a calm, domestic moment is overshadowed by impending disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bizarre tableau of simultaneous peace and escalating chaos all at once.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could just shout a warning into the scene, to snap them out of it.
segments.speaker: PAR
